content: July 26 LogMeIn Inc and a unit of Citrix Systems Inc that makes software products such as GoToMeeting said on Tuesday they are merging in an all-stock deal to create a $1.8 billion company focused on technology applications for the workplace.

title: LogMeIn to merge with Citrix's GoTo unit in all-stock deal
